meanings.sent1: The humungous elephant towered over the trees.
meanings.sent2: The humungous cake was enough to feed the whole party.
meanings.sent3: The humungous teddy bear looked comically large in the tiny chair.
meanings.sent4: Her humungous appetite was like a bottomless pit.
meanings.sent5: The humungous mountain cast a shadow over the entire valley.

meanings.definition: Very big in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: We were amazed by the humungous waves crashing against the shore.
meanings.sent2: The humungous building could be seen from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The humungous watermelon was almost too heavy to carry.
meanings.sent4: His humungous collection of stamps filled up an entire room.
meanings.sent5: The humungous storm clouds darkened the sky ominously.
